RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: sublotIdentifier
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The identifier of the identified sublot

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: batchIdentifier
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The identifier of the identified batch

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: srcContainerId
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The identifier of the identified source container

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: srcContainerShortDesc
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The short description of the source container

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: srcContainerObject
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The directly or indirectly identified source container

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: originalQuantity
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The original planned quantity of the order-step-input

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: plannedQuantity
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The planned quantity of the order-step-input

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: nominalQuantity
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The nominal quantity based on the identified sublot

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: plannedPotency
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The planned potency of the order-step-input

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: actualPotency
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The potency of the identified sublot

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: printedSublotKey
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: ID of the target sublot, for which a label was printed in this phase

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: orderStepInputKey
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The key of the current order step input (OSI)

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: materialIdentifier
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The identifier of material of the identified batch

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: materialShortDescr
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The short description of material of the identified batch

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: materialType
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The type of material of the identified batch

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: isSplitPosition
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Is it a split position?

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: splitPosition
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The split number (0 for the main position, 1..n for split positions, if applicable)

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: sublotIdentified
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Was a sublot identified? Otherwise batch supposed.

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: weighingType
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The weighing type of material of the identified batch

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: weighingMethod
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The weighing method of material of the identified batch (Identification Only)

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: actualQuantity
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: The actual quantity of material of the identified batch (Identification Only)

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: targetSublotIdent
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Ident of the target sublot (Identification Only)

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: identifiedOnly
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Was material only identified?

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: diffBatchIdentified
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Was a different batch identified?

RtPhaseDataAttribute.Name: targetContainerClosed
RtPhaseDataAttribute.Description: Was the target container closed (no material identified)?
